Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 8 Prop. No. 1 -- 9.75 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 8 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 8 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of nine and seventy-five hundredths (9.75) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $333,808 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including movable and immovable property, to be used by the District directly or indirectly to provide fire protection and emergency medical services in and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 8 Prop. No. 2 -- 9.80 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 8 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 8 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of nine and eighty hundredths (9.80) mills (the "Tax") on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $335,520 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including movable and immovable property, to be used by the District directly or indirectly to provide fire protection and emergency medical services in and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 8 Prop. No. 3 -- 14.63 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 8 Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 8 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of fourteen and sixty-three hundredths (14.63) mills (the "Tax") on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $500,884 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including movable and immovable property, to be used by the District directly or indirectly to provide fire protection and emergency medical services in and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 12 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 12 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 12 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,527,988 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2037, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities, equipment and rescue and emergency medical services in and for the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
